你有没有想过，在所有的电子游戏中，谁是最难的 Boss？好吧，我们问了巴德。聊天机器人给了我们一些有趣的结果，但考虑到这些老板有多难，其中一些也是有道理的。我们希望巴德给我们“科学”的答案，并询问它是否可以让电子游戏中最难的老板“按照人们搜索指南击败他们的次数降序排列”。

玩电子游戏提供了一个极好的机会来测试你的能力，享受你自己，并暂时脱离现实世界。然而，在某些情况下，游戏会让人感到沮丧，尤其是在面对极具挑战性的老板时。这些具有挑战性的敌人是对你的技能、战略思维和耐力的终极考验。成功克服它们可以极大地提升您的游戏之旅，而被它们击败可能会对您的整体体验产生持久影响。

“这份榜单是根据谷歌趋势数据得出的，该数据追踪人们在谷歌上搜索某些词条的次数。数据显示，科斯孤儿是视频游戏中搜索次数最多的 Boss，其次是无名之王，奴隶骑士盖尔、路德维希、圣剑、蝴蝶小姐。”巴德说道。看起来Bard认为 Bloodborne 和 Dark Souls III 拥有电子游戏行业中最难对付的 Boss。这是列表：

科斯孤儿（血源）

孤儿人物表现出既是人类又是已故科斯人的后裔的特征。它看起来是一个高大、骨瘦如柴的人形生物，在整个战斗中始终保持阴森森的笑容和持续不断的尖叫声。一层虚无缥缈的膜像斗篷一样披在它的背上，在它的第二阶段变成翅膀。

在战斗中，孤儿使用自己的胎盘作为武器，将其用作棍棒或连枷。它有能力从胎盘撕下碎片，将它们变成爆炸性射弹。随着孤儿的转变，胎盘会变异成一把巨大的斧头或类似长剑的武器。

在它“失败”后，孤儿留下科斯寄生虫，它的黑暗幻影在科斯死去的形体附近实体化。与幻影接触会导致它消散，并伴随一条消息宣布“噩梦已死”，类似于与 Mergo 的奶妈的遭遇。

无名之王（黑暗之魂 III）

种种迹象表明，无名之王实际上是格温勋爵的长子。在 Gwyn 的后代中——Filianore、Gwynevere、Gwyndolin 和一个身份不明的长子——这个难以捉摸的长子在少数物品描述中很少提及。这些参考资料暗示这个孩子曾经拥有战神的神圣称号。在一次“愚蠢”的行为之后，格温流放了他的儿子并抹去了他存在的所有痕迹，竭尽全力从历史记录中抹去对他的任何提及。

虽然与无名之王的战斗对玩家来说可能具有挑战性，但熟悉他的招式无疑会让事情变得简单。在召唤老板之前，应该记住两件事。霍克伍德，如果被召唤，一旦铃声响起，将使用黑色分离水晶，使召唤无效。在这次遭遇之前，他可能会被杀死，从而使召唤成为可能。此外，敲响召唤风暴之王的钟声会在大龙峰上掀起一场巨大的风暴，并在怪物被杀死后退去。

奴隶骑士盖尔（黑暗之魂 III）

奴隶骑士盖尔是电子游戏《黑暗之魂 3》中的 Boss。盖尔可以通过环城 DLC 访问，通常被认为是整个黑暗之魂系列中的最后一个 Boss。盖尔的战斗活动和他为之奋斗的王国不为人知。他最终遇到了 Ariandel 的 Painted 宇宙和一个想要创造一个全新宇宙的年轻女子。他披着一件鲜红色的大斗篷。当玩家面对他时，他一开始像野兽一样四肢着地移动和战斗，但当他的生命值降低到一定程度以下时，他会站直。

“流浪的红袍奴隶骑士盖尔寻求黑暗灵魂的血液作为彩绘世界的颜料。但盖尔知道他不是冠军，黑暗灵魂很可能毁了他，而且他没有希望安全返回，”游戏中的描述说。

路德维希，圣剑（血源）

被诅咒者路德维希是血源诅咒老猎人扩展包中的 Boss。作为教会的第一个猎手，他还创办了治愈教会工坊。他还被路德维希称为圣剑，这是他的官方绰号，他在第二轮战斗中使用了这个绰号。

该生物的下半身纤细，似乎已经剥去了皮肤，露出四条不均匀但结实的腿，腿末端是蹄子。它的上半身是精神错乱的混乱表现。一个驼背突出在两条长有锋利爪子的细长手臂之间，露出圆圆的嘴巴，里面长满参差不齐的牙齿和多对眼睛。它的脸，右眼似乎已经看不见了，是一团扭曲的皮肤和扭曲的牙齿，延伸在一个细长的脑袋上，脑袋有点像马。

蝴蝶夫人（只狼：影逝二度）

蝴蝶夫人是一个可选的 Boss，分为两个阶段，每个阶段都有一个致死计数器。打败她对于完成平田村年轻领主的铃铛护身符至关重要。

蝴蝶夫人是一个可怕而独特的敌人，它的失败以特殊的屏幕信息为标志，例如“Shinobi Execution”或“Immortality Severed”。她可以在平田庄园内一座被火焰吞没的寺庙中找到。要打败她，玩家必须在执行最后一步之前耗尽她的两个健康栏。

我们在视频游戏中排名前 5 位的最难老板

视频游戏中最难对付的 Boss 不一定是最近游戏中的对手。视频游戏历史上有无数的硬 Boss，但其中一些确实让我们感到恼火，因为我们无数次试图击败它们。下面的列表包括五个电子游戏中的硬头目，其中一些可能会让您回想起过去，尤其是 1987 年为任天堂娱乐系统 (NES) 开发的迈克泰森！

  • Skolas——命运
  • 阿瑞斯——战神
  • 迈克泰森 - 出拳！！
  • 复仇女神 – 生化危机 3
  • 但丁 - 鬼泣4

Apple 在 WWDC 2023 主题演讲中有许多头条新闻，但配备 M2 Ultra 的新款 Mac Pro 是该公司发布的最重要的公告之一。 Apple 没有进行任何设计更改，而是专注于内饰以提供更好的性能。

这家总部位于库比蒂诺的公司决定重新推出具有著名硬件配置的 Mac Pro，以跟上当今技术的发展步伐。看起来新款 Mac Pro 与旧款相比的唯一区别在于内部。

配备 M2 Ultra 规格的全新 Mac Pro

最新版本的 Mac Pro 保留了其标志性的奶酪刨丝器金属前面板，类似于之前的 Intel 变体。但是，已经实施了重要的内部增强功能。 Mac Pro 拥有 Apple 先进的 M2 Ultra 芯片，除了具有八个集成的 Thunderbolt 端口外，现在还可以容纳六个可访问的 PCIe Gen 4 插槽以实现无缝扩展。值得注意的是，它可以定制为包含强大的 76 核 GPU 和令人印象深刻的 192GB 内存。 据 Apple 称，在配备齐全的情况下，该型号的速度可以达到其英特尔前身的三倍。

  • 另请阅读： Apple 推出世界上最薄的 15 英寸 MacBook Air

它现在具有八个 Thunderbolt 4 端口，而不是四个，以增强连接性。此外，还有两个带宽增加的 HDMI 端口，能够以平滑的 240Hz 支持令人惊叹的 8K 显示。该塔还提供七个 PCIe 扩展槽、双 10 千兆以太网端口和一个适合阻抗耳机的耳机插孔。此外，这款电脑还可以定制 8TB 的 SSD 存储空间。

发布日期

配备 M2 Ultra 的新款 Mac Pro 将于 6 月 13 日上市。幸运的是，我们不必像 Apple Vision Pro 耳机那样等待数月，后者将于 2024 年初上市。我们距离正式发布日期只有一周的时间功能强大的 Mac Pro。

配备 M2 Ultra 价格的全新 Mac Pro

在美国，Mac Pro 的起价为 6,999 美元，与之前的 Intel 版本起价 5,999 美元相比有所上涨。对于那些对机架安装版 Mac Pro 感兴趣的人，它仍然可以以 7,499 美元的起价购买。

刚刚超过 3 GB 的数据构成了第一个 iOS 17 测试版。此外，Apple 确实从其兼容性列表中排除了某些设备。您将在本文中找到所有必要的信息。这是在您的设备上获取 iOS 17 测试版的方法！

如何在大规模使用前获得 iOS 17 Beta

如前所述，这是开发人员测试版，您需要注册 Apple 的计划才能试用测试版。如果您尚未注册该计划，则无法测试新功能。如果您已经注册并想知道如何在手机上获取 iOS 17 beta，请按照以下步骤操作：

  1. 备份您的iPhone 。 （这会让你降级到 iOS 16）
  2. 转到手机上的设置。 （您的手机必须至少运行 iOS 16.4）
  3. 选择通用。
  4. 点击软件更新。
  5. 等待几秒钟，然后在Beta 更新按钮出现时点击它。
  6. 选择开发人员测试版。
  7. 点击返回。
  8. 下载 iOS 17 Developer Beta ，它将出现在您的屏幕上。

第一个 iOS 17 公开测试版何时可用？

目前，您只能测试开发者测试版，公测版将于 7 月推出。这是因为苹果还有很多事情要弄清楚，他们会先从开发者那里得到反馈，然后再发布给大众使用。这样，公司将有更多时间来测试和解决主要问题，这样公众将有机会测试一个更干净的版本，几乎没有错误、错误和问题。

随着旧配置文件结构的删除，Apple 正在限制下载并使测试版仅供拥有开发者帐户的用户访问。目前，需要注意的是，下载和安装测试版都需要一个与开发者账户相关联的 Apple ID。

Apple 最近发布了其最新的操作系统 visionOS，专为即将推出的Vision Pro耳机设计。这家科技巨头强调，visionOS 经过精心开发，可以满足空间计算的要求。

在2023 年全球开发者大会期间，Apple 发布了几项公告，包括推出他们的新操作系统。该操作系统的重点是呈现叠加在物理世界上的数字元素。在最近发布的视频中，Apple 展示了悬浮图标和与真实环境无缝融合的窗口等进步。

您可以主要通过使用眼睛、手和声音来操作耳机。 Apple 展示了一项新功能，使用户可以通过对着搜索字段说话来输入文本。用户还可以通过捏合手指来选择项目或向上轻弹手指来滚动窗口来进行交互。 Vision Pro 的另一个值得注意的功能是“ EyeSight ”，它允许用户将他们的眼睛投射到耳机的外部。

Apple 将 Vision Pro 视为提高生产力的工具，正如最近一次活动中所展示的那样。在演示中，可以看到一个人正在检查不同的项目，包括 Safari、消息和 Apple Music 窗口，所有这些都悬​​挂在物理世界的桌子上方。 Apple 在演示期间还展示了一个浮动键盘。 Vision Pro 可以与 Mac 建立连接，允许用户在耳机上放大 Mac 的显示。

报告表明该设备将提供重要的娱乐功能。 Apple 展示了通过捏住角落来放大窗口的能力，展示了节目基金会的片段。还强调了一项名为“环境”的新功能，该功能使用户能够在电影院般的环境或胡德山前等各种背景下显示他们的屏幕，从而提供个性化的观看体验。 Vision Pro 还将支持 3D 电影，迪士尼正在为其虚拟现实耳机开发内容。迪士尼首席执行​​官 Bob Iger 证实，迪士尼 Plus 从发布之日起就可以在耳机上使用。

Apple 即将推出的设备 Vision Pro 将支持游戏和游戏控制器。在演示中，Apple 展示了一个使用 PS5 DualSense 耳机和 Vision Pro 的人。在他们的主题演讲中，Apple 宣布 Apple Arcade 推出的第一天将有 ​​100 多款游戏可供游玩。

配备 3D 相机的 Vision Pro 允许用户捕捉可在耳机内查看的空间照片和视频。当通过设备观看时，全景照片能够超出用户的视野。 Apple 还宣布了FaceTime的空间增强功能。在一份新闻稿中，该公司提到在 FaceTime 通话期间佩戴 Vision Pro 的用户将被表示为数字角色。该角色是使用先进的机器学习技术生成的，并实时反映用户的面部表情和手部动作。

Apple 透露，visionOS 将推出全新的 App Store ，让用户能够下载专为 Vision Pro 耳机设计的应用程序。 Vision Pro 还将与大量 iPhone 和 iPad 应用程序具有广泛的兼容性，据苹果称，估计有数十万个。

Apple 最新操作系统的发布对公司和开发人员来说都是一个重要时刻。

考虑到所有因素，问题仍然存在：visionOS 能否取得与 iOS 相同的成功水平？

只有时间会证明一切，但随着 Apple 的决心和开发者的不断努力，未来 visionOS 拥有巨大的潜力来开辟自己的道路并达到前所未有的高度。你怎么看？您认为 visionOS 具备达到 iOS 级别成功所需的条件吗？

什么是 iOS 17 上的联系人照片和海报？

iOS 17 中引入的联系人照片和海报功能使用户能够在通话时自定义他们在某人 iPhone 上的外观。借助此功能，您可以选择各种元素，例如表情符号、个性化照片和字体样式，以便在与他人联系时显示您的姓名。

在 iOS 17 上更改联系人照片和海报

    • 海报：此滤镜为您的图像提供海报化外观。您可以选择要与此过滤器一起使用的预设或自定义颜色。
    • Studio：此选项应用 Studio Portrait Lighting 效果，该效果也可在 Camera 应用程序中使用。点击灯光图标，根据您的喜好选择高调或低调灯光。

    • 彩色背景：此选项会在突出主题的同时为图像添加彩色背景。点击颜色图标选择背景预设之一，然后使用滑块调整其活力。

Firefox 114.0 and Firefox 102.12.0 ESR are the June 2023 releases of Mozilla's Firefox web browser. Official release date is June 6, 2023.

The new version of Firefox is a security update, but it also introduces new nice-to-have features that improve search and the usability of the browser.

Firefox 114.0 and the ESR release are available for all supported platforms. The updates will be released later on June 6th, if you are reading this on the day.

All development channel versions of Firefox are updated at around the same time. Firefox Beta and Dev are moved to version 115, and Firefox Nightly is moved to version 116. Firefox for Android follows the stable version, it is updated to version 114 as well.

执行摘要

  • Firefox 114 patches 4 security issues in Firefox, the aggregate severity rating is high, and Mozilla makes no mention of exploits in the wild.
  • Mozilla added the ability to change the order of extension icons.
  • Bookmarks and Local search improvements added.
  • Enabled native capture support on macOS devices.
  • A new Firefox ESR base will be released next month. It is based on Firefox 115, and will be the new base for Windows 7 and 8.1 users.

Firefox 114 download and update

Most Firefox installations will receive the new update automatically, thanks to the built-in updating functionality. The updating does not happen in realtime, and some users may want to speed it up by downloading Firefox manually or by running a manual check for updates.

Select Menu >; Help >; About Firefox to display the installed version. The popup that opens runs a check for updates. Any new version found is either downloaded automatically or on user request at this point.

Here are the official download locations:

  • Firefox Stable download
  • Firefox Beta download
  • Nightly download
  • Firefox ESR download
  • Firefox for Android on Google Play

Firefox 114.0 new features and improvements

Secure DNS (DNS over HTTPS) settings in UI

Firefox 114 makes it easier to configure DNS over HTTPS in the browser. Mozilla calls it secure DNS, and the new options are found under Settings >; Privacy & Security >; Enable secure DNS using.

There are four options right now that define whether DNS traffic will be encrypted or not when using the Firefox web browser:

  • Default Protection -- Firefox makes the decision using the following logic:
    • Use secure DNS if it is available in the region.
    • Use default DNS provider, if there are issues with the secure DNS provider.
    • Use a local provider, if possible.
    • Turn off secure DNS, if a VPN is used, parental controls are enabled, or Enterprise policies are active.
    • Turn off secure DNS "when a network tells Firefox it shouldn't use secure DNS".
  • Increased Protection -- gives the user control over the feature. The secure DNS provider is selected by the user, but Firefox will fall back to the regular DNS provider if there is a problem with the secure DNS provider.
  • Max Protection -- gives the user control, but won't fall back if issues are encountered. Warning is displayed if secure DNS is not available.
  • Off -- the feature is not enabled.

Search improvements

A new option to search bookmarks has been added to the Bookmarks menu. To access it, select Menu >; Bookmarks >; Search Bookmarks. This enables a bookmarks-exclusive search filter in the Firefox address bar.

Firefox supported this for a long time with the special character *. All it takes is to type * then Space, followed by the search term to search only in the browser's bookmarks.

Mozilla has also added an option to restrict searches to the local browsing history. This option is available in the History, Library and the Application menu. Firefox users may use the special character ^ followed by the Space-key to limit searches in the browser's address bar to the browsing history.

Other changes and fixes

  • Video capturing on macOS devices supports all native resolutions in Firefox 114. Resolutions were limited to 1280x720 previously.
  • The list of extensions can now be reordered in the Extensions panel.
  • Users on macOS, Linux, and Windows 7 can now use FIDO2 / WebAuthn authenticators over USB.
  • Pocket Recommended content is now available in France, Italy and Spain.

Developer changes

  • CSSImportRule.supportsText can now be used for getting any supports() conditions that were specified when using the @import at-rule
  • The -webkit-text-security property that lets you replace characters with shapes is now supported.
  • The :lang() pseudo-class now uses string-matching semantics (including * wildcards) for matching language codes rather than prefix-matching semantics.
  • The infinity and NaN constants are now supported inside the calc() function
  • The crossorigin attribute is now supported on image and feImage elements
  • Window.print() now opens a print dialog on Firefox for Android, allowing the current document to be printed
  • Workers now support loading ECMAScript modules.
  • Worklets can now use import to statically import ECMAscript/JavaScript modules
  • The deprecated and non-standard mozImageSmoothingEnabled property is permanently removed
  • Support for browser_style in the manifest keys action, options_ui, page_action, and sidebar_action is deprecated for Manifest V3 extensions.
  • WebTransport is now enabled by default and will be going to release with 114

Enterprise changes

  • The WebsiteFilter policy allows setting the blocklist and Exceptions via JSON.
  • The Preferences policy allows setting security.osclientcerts.assume_rsa_pss_support to add RSA-PSS support.
  • The SecurityDevices policy supports deleting security devices now.
  • Firefox ESR 115 will be released next month. The remaining Firefox 102 ESR releases will only get security updates going forward.
  • Support for Windows 7 and 8.1 is ending on September 26, 2024. Firefox installations on these devices will be migrated to ESR automatically.
  • Support for macOS 10.12, 10.13 and 10.14 ends on September 26, 2024 as well. Firefox installations on these platforms will also be migrated to ESR automatically.

Security updates / fixes

Mozilla Firefox 114 fixes 4 security issues in Firefox:

  • CVE-2023-34414: Click-jacking certificate exceptions through rendering lag
  • CVE-2023-34415: Site-isolation bypass on sites that allow open redirects to data: urls
  • CVE-2023-34416: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 114 and Firefox ESR 102.12
  • CVE-2023-34417: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 114

Additional information about the security fixes is available here .

iPadOS 17 has been released alongside iOS 17 and macOS 14 Sonoma . Apple has added some interesting features that iPad users may appreciate.

What's new in iPadOS 17

iPadOS 17 finally brings the Lock Screen experience that we saw in iOS 16. You can tap and hold on the lock screen to edit the wallpaper, there are various options to choose from including a kaleidoscope, live photos with a slow motion effect, astronomy wallpapers, and even your own photos. You may customize the lock screen by adjusting the font type, color, and weight.

Of course, you may add widgets as well. The new widgets in iPadOS 17 are interactive on the Lock Screen and Home Screen, meaning you can use them without opening apps. For example, you can tap on reminders, play music, and perform other actions. The widgets also support live activities such as travel ETA, food delivery, scores and, timers. Apple has confirmed that users may use Siri to set multiple timers.

Health app comes to iPad

The Health app, which was previously exclusive to iPhone is available for the first time on iPad, so you can view your health status using the various interactive charts that it has to offer, track your medication, etc. The app has a new mental health feature that users can use to log their daily moods, emotions, etc., to monitor their well-being.

Screen Distance is a new addition that is available in Screen Time, it uses the TrueDepth camera in the front to check if you are holding the device closer than 12 inches for a long time, and advises you to move it further. This will help adults reduce digital eyestrain, and lower the risk of myopia in children.

Improved PDF support

Users can open PDFs directly on their iPad, and iOS 17 will allow them to edit text fields. The feature supports autofill, and also works with documents scanned with camera. You may use it to fill names, addresses, emails or even to sign forms.

PDFs are now supported in the Notes app, you can add multiple PDFs to a note. The app lets you annotate the documents using Apple Pencil, and live collaboration with others whom you have shared the note with.

Stage Manager and Spotlight

The multitasking option in iPadOS 17 has new flexible layouts that let you move and resize windows easily.

It now supports using your external display's built-in camera for FaceTime and other video calls.

Spotlight search displays a shortcut next to each action that you can tap to execute the command, for instance, an app shortcut or searching for favorite albums. The search utility improves the visual results and video search experience.

Freeform

The Freeform app has new drawing tools such as a watercolor brush, calligraphy pen, highlighter, variable-width pen, and ruler that will help you get creative. The app's new Shape recognition can detect shapes like squares and snap them into place. Freeform now lets you collaborate with other users in real-time.

  • iPad Pro (2nd generation and later)
  • iPad Air（第 3 代及更新机型）
  • iPad（第 6 代及更新机型）
  • iPad mini（第 5 代及更新机型）

Apple says that iPadOS 17 will be released in Fall 2023.

iOS 17 and iPadOS 17 were announced at WWDC 2023, alongside macOS 14 Sonoma . Let's take a look at all the important features in the next-gen mobile operating system.

New features in iOS 17

Siri no longer requires the Hey Siri command, you can now activate the digital assistant by saying Siri. And Siri supports back-to-back commands without having to trigger it each time.

Contact Posters

The Phone app (aka the dialer) in iOS 17 supports personalized contact posters. The feature supports photos and memoji, and is also visible in contact cards. Contact posters are customizable, you can define the font type, and color. Apple says that contact posters are also supported in 3rd party VOIP apps.

Live VoiceMail

When someone calls you and leaves a voice message, your iPhone will display a live transcription of the voicemail on the screen. The Live VoiceMail, as the name suggests, works in realtime as the caller is speaking, so you can decide whether to pick up the call immediately or not. The feature processes the transcription on your device for your privacy.

FaceTime

The FaceTime app now lets you record and send an audio or video message to your contact if they are not available. The app now has reactions such as hearts, balloons, fireworks, laser beams, rain, and more. They can be triggered with simple gestures, and are also supported in third-party video calling apps. Apple says that it has added a most-requested feature to Facetime, the video calling app now supports video messages. So if someone isn't available at the moment, you can record a video message for them to see.

Improvements to Messages

The new search filters in the Messages app lets you add additional terms to an existing query to narrow down the results. The Messages app has a new button in the top right corner, called the catch-up arrow, which you can tap to jump to the first message that you have not read in a chat (or a group conversation). Messages finally lets you reply inline with swipe to reply. The app displays transcriptions for audio messages. Location sharing now displays your friend/family's location directly in the app, ie inline location.

The new Check In feature automatically lets loved ones or friends know that you reached home (or your destination) safely. It automatically detects delays during your trip, and prompts you to add an ETA. If you don't respond to the prompt, Messages will automatically send your location, the route you took, your iPhone's battery level, and cell service status to alert your contact. Apple says that all data used to update your contact is end-to-end encrypted.

The iMessage apps are no longer visible above your keyboard, they are now hidden and can be accessed by tapping on the Plus button. The + menu has a new Stickers experience, iOS 17 has made all emojis into stickers. The feature supports peel and stick, (drag and drop) and lets you resize the stickers. You can select subjects from your own photos or other pictures and turn them into stickers. It also supports animated stickers (live stickers), and lets you add effects to them. Stickers can be used to react to messages. Stickers are available system-wide, and are also available in 3rd party apps.

报到

Apple's new safety feature, Check In, will allow iPhone to notify your family or friend that you have reached a location safely. It will detect delays if you haven't reached your destination on time, and if you don't respond to the prompts, Check In alerts your contact with your location, route, battery level and network status to help them reach you.

Airdrop

Apple's wireless file sharing protocol, AirDrop now supports NameDrop. The feature lets iPhone users exchange their contact information by bringing their phones. It also supports exchange between Apple Watch and iPhone. The same gesture also supports sharing files, photos, etc. Apple says that you may leave AirDrop range and the devices will share the content over the internet, this feature is coming later this year. The gesture can be used to start a shared activity using SharePlay, it also works with apps that support SharePlay API.

AirPlay will work with supported televisions in hotels to let users watch their media on a TV. The feature will roll out to select hotels, starting with brands from IHG Hotels & Resorts.

Keyboard and Dictation

Autocorrect has new transformer language model to improve the accuracy of autocorrect. It can now correct typos in sentence-level, ie it fixes multiple errors at once. You may tap on an underlined word that was detected by autocorrect, to see the original word that you typed, and revert to it.

The keyboard in iOS 17 now displays inline word predictions (based on your usage) to help you finish typing your sentence quickly, and you can just tap the space bar to add the words. Dictation (voice input) has a new speech recognition model for the Neural Engine, to improve the accuracy of the input.

Journal app debuts

Apple unveiled its Journal app that we reported about previously. The Cupertino company says that the new app uses on-device machine learning to create personalized suggestions of moments to inspire your writing, to practice gratitude and improve your well-being. These suggestions are created based on your photos, location, activity (such as workouts), and music. The app will also offer reflection prompts to help you write in your journal.

The data in the Journal app is end-to-end encrypted and cannot be accessed by others. Journal is coming to iPhone later this year.

StandBy

iOS 17 can turn your iPhone into a smart display with a new feature called Standby. All you need to do is tilt the phone to the side while charging on a nightstand, kitchen counter, or desk. It displays a full screen always-on experience that displays the time and clock, and supports different clock styles, photos, widgets for weather home controls, 3rd party widgets, calendars, live activities (food delivery, scores).

You can even use it to set a timer with Siri. Standby detects low light environments and switches to a red tone that is easy on the eyes.

Maps

The Maps app supports offline download of an area including turn-by-turn navigation, ETA, and also lets you find places nearby. Users in the US can find thousands of trails in parks, and charging stations for electric vehicles with real-time charging availability information.

AirTag sharing

An AirTag can now be shared with up to five other people who are on iOS 17. This is not limited to your family, so you can share it with friends too, to keep track of an item in Find My. All users in a group will be able to see the item's location, use Precision Finding or to play a sound. The feature is supported in other Find My network accessories.

Accessibility Updates

Apple has introduced Assistive Access, which can aid users with cognitive disabilities to use their iPhone with ease. It has a customizable interface, which we discussed in our previous coverage. Live Speech will help nonspeaking users an option to type and have their words spoken in person, or during phone and FaceTime calls. Personal Voice can help users at risk of speech loss to create a voice that sounds like their own. Point and Speak has been designed to assist blind or low vision users to read text on physical objects by pointing the phone at the labels.

Apple Music

Collaborative Playlists are the latest feature that have made their way to the Apple Music app, you can create playlists with your friends, and use it with SharePlay. Listeners in the group can control the music on their own device, even if they do not have an active Apple Music subscription.

Other notable changes in iOS 17

iOS 17 introduces Interactive Widgets to control devices, perform actions without opening other apps. AirPods have a new feature called Adaptive Audio that adjusts the volume and noise isolation based on background noise. The audio wearables also support Personalized Volume, and Conversation Awareness, as well as improvements to Automatic Switching and call controls.

The Home app in iOS 17 lets users view up to 30 days of activity history across door locks, garage doors, alarm systems, and contact sensors Tap to unlock and PIN codes are now supported on Matter-compatible locks. Visual Look Up now works with paused video frames, and can be used to lift individual subjects from photos and videos. It also lets you identify food, storefronts, signs, and symbols.

Photos app supports on-device machine learning to recognize a user's favorite people, and pets such as cats and dogs. Communication Safety is expanding to AirDrop, Contact Posters, FaceTime Messages and Photos picker. Sensitive Content Warning will help prevent adult users to avoid seeing unwanted nude images and videos.

How to fix Youtube not working issues

Before delving into any other solutions, it is crucial to determine whether the problem lies with YouTube itself. Although it is rare for YouTube to experience a complete outage, such occurrences do happen.

To check the status of YouTube, Downdetector is an invaluable resource that aggregates user reports, providing insights into reported issues and their geographical distribution. It is a handy tool to identify whether YouTube is down for everyone or just affecting a specific group of users.

Furthermore, consider exploring YouTube's official social media channels, such as @TeamYouTube on Twitter , to obtain firsthand updates from the company.

In the event of a widespread YouTube outage, all you can do is exercise patience and wait for the service to be restored. If, on the other hand, YouTube appears to be functioning normally for others, proceed with the following troubleshooting steps.

How to fix Youtube not working on Smart TV

The YouTube app is a convenient way to enjoy videos, but it can be frustrating when it doesn't launch, play, load, or connect on your Smart TV. This hinders access to desired content and causes issues like wasted time, data usage, and a poor user experience.

Here is what you need to do if Youtube not working on your Smart TV:

  • Check your internet connection
  • Address browser-related issues
  • Keep your software updated
  • Clear unnecessary data
  • Allocate sufficient memory for apps

Check your internet connection

Ensure that you have a stable internet connection by checking your router, modem, and network interference. Resetting your router or modem can often resolve connectivity issues, and it is, most of the time, a simple yet certain solution for Youtube not working issues.

Address browser-related issues

If you're using an older or unsupported web browser, it may cause problems loading YouTube content. Adjust your browser's security settings if needed.

Keep your software updated

Outdated software can cause playback issues. Regularly update your Smart TV's software to ensure smooth performance.

Clear unnecessary data

Remove unnecessary data on your Smart TV to free up space and improve performance.

Allocate sufficient memory for apps

Ensure that enough memory is allocated for apps, including YouTube, to ensure smooth streaming without interruptions.

How to fix Youtube not working on iOS and Android

If your Youtube not working on your mobile device what you need to do is pretty simple:

  • Update your OS
  • Reinstall the Youtube app
  • Clear the YouTube app cache and data
  • Sync the date and time

Update your OS

Make sure your iOS or Android device is running the latest version of the operating system. Check for available updates in the settings menu.

Reinstall the Youtube app

Always use the latest version of the YouTube app to benefit from bug fixes and new features. Check your device's app store for updates or use the links below.

  • Youtube for Android
  • Youtube for iOS

Clear the YouTube app cache and data

Clearing cached data can resolve issues caused by accumulated files. In the settings menu, locate the YouTube app and clear the cache or reinstall the app if necessary.

Sync the date and time

Ensure that your device's date and time are synchronized with the YouTube server to avoid glitches. Enable automatic date and time settings in the device settings.

How to fix Youtube not working on PC

Most of the time, computers do not have problems with Youtube. This is because you use a browser to access Youtube on your PC instead of an app, and therefore access the platform through Youtube servers.

But if Youtube not working on your PC, here are the things you should do:

  • Update your browser
  • Clear cookies and cache
  • Disable browser extensions
  • Update video drivers

Update your browser

Keep your web browser up to date to ensure compatibility with YouTube. Check for updates in the browser's settings or preferences.

Clear cookies and cache

Clearing cookies and cache can resolve issues related to stored data. Access your browser's settings, find the option to clear browsing data, and select cookies and cached files.

Disable browser extensions

Some browser extensions can interfere with YouTube. Disable extensions one by one and check if the Youtube not working issue is resolved.

Update video drivers

Outdated video drivers can cause playback problems. Visit your graphics card manufacturer's website and update the drivers accordingly.

Firefox users who run searches from the browser's address bar may have noticed that the browser displays the entered search term and not the address of the search engine on the search results page anymore.

Mozilla announced the change in the Firefox 113 release notes, but appears to have rolled out the functionality gradually to installations of the browser.

Please note that Firefox does not display the search term in the address bar if a dedicated search field is displayed in the browser's address bar; it can be added by right-clicking on a blank spot on the main toolbar and selecting the "customize toolbar" option from the menu. Drag & drop the search element to the Firefox toolbar to display it there.

The browser displays a notification to users the first time this happens. Mozilla explains that the change makes searching simpler, as it makes it easier to adjust the search term directly in the address bar of the browser.

While some Firefox users may appreciate the change, others may dislike it, as it breaks one of the fundamental principles of web browsing: that the URL of the active page is always visible and accessible in browsers.

Mozilla might argue that the URL is not that important in this specific case, and that users know that they are on Google or another default search engine that they have set in the browser. Clearly, most Internet users who run searches do not need access to the URL of the search engine, as they do not edit it manually or use copy or share operations.

Critics argue that users may also edit the search term on the results page directly, as the default search engine usually displays a search field with the term there as well. Google, which is Firefox's default search engine in most regions, displays the search field at the top of the results page directly.

Disabling the search term in the URL in Firefox

Firefox users may disable the new functionality, so that the address of the search engine is displayed again in the browser's address bar.

Here is how that is done:

  1. Load about:preferences#search in the browser's address bar.
  2. Under Search Bar, uncheck the "Show search terms instead of URL on default search engine results pages" to return to the status quo.

The change happens immediately, a restart of the Firefox web browser is not required. To undo the change, check the box again the Firefox preferences.

Closing Words

The display of the search term instead of the URL in Firefox's address bar, when the default search engine is used, is not really all that helpful. The search engine displays the term on its results page usually, which gives users the option to adjust it as needed. Even more problematic is the removal of the URL in the address bar, as it breaks a fundamental principle of browsing on the Internet.

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. 暗黑破坏神 4 后补丁平衡死灵法师并留下野蛮人的渴望首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

暗黑破坏神 4 的最新补丁说明刚刚发布，在6 月 6 日完整发布之前包含大量令人兴奋的游戏更新。在暗黑破坏神 4 中，数字至关重要，就像在任何动作角色扮演游戏中一样。游戏迷人的视觉风格最初吸引了玩家的注意力，但真正让他们着迷的是自由创建和定制自己独特的角色。

暗黑破坏神 4 的最新补丁说明，特别是版本 1.0.2d，表明自 6 月 3 日抢先体验以来，该游戏的各种类别没有发生重大变化。最新的补丁不是对抢先体验用户已经熟悉的内容进行重大更改，而是patch 似乎专注于改进和微调现有功能。在这些职业中，野蛮人职业得到的调整最少，挑战怒吼的伤害减免被降低，并且对职业的传奇方面进行了一些调整。

另一方面，死灵法师仆从和德鲁伊伙伴都获得了防御提升，从而减少了持续伤害效果所造成的伤害。血长枪、血浪和亡者大军等死灵法师技能也得到了增强，为使用这些技能的死灵法师构建带来了好消息。然而，游戏中的 Paragon Glyphs 被削弱了，整体减少了 34%。之前增加暴击率和弱点减益效力的某些雕文的威力降低了 66%。此外，一些节点的奖励减少了至少 50%。

在博客文章中，暴雪解释了他们进行调整的理由：

“总的来说，我们对班级的表现非常满意，但我们知道总有改进的余地。我们做出这些改变的目标是全面创造一种更平衡、更愉快的体验。”

最近暗黑破坏神 4 更新的另一个目标是减少对特定职业组合及其协同作用的过度依赖。开发人员表示，某些版本被认为“超出了我们对游戏健康的合理范围”。例如，我们通常希望避免创造玩家可以长时间承受不合理的高伤害的情况，因为这极大地扭曲了我们对暗黑破坏神 4 中战斗方式的看法。”

暗黑破坏神 IV 补丁说明 1.0.2d Build #42131

以下是暴雪分享的完整补丁说明：

暗黑破坏神 IV 团队一直在认真监控您的反馈。当我们推出补丁以确保您在 Sanctuary 中的体验顺畅时，我们将更新以下列表并说明这些修复是针对 PC、Xbox、PlayStation 还是所有平台。

2023 年 6 月 3 日 - 暗黑破坏神 IV 补丁说明 1.0.2d Build #42131（所有平台）

流浪者你好！

我们对职业做了一些平衡调整，并想提供我们背后的理由。总的来说，我们对班级的表现非常满意，但我们知道总有改进的余地。我们进行这些更改的目的是全面创造更平衡、更愉快的体验。我们的更新分为 3 类：

  1. 虽然我们希望玩家既能感受到又能真正强大，但某些职业构建和协同作用超出了我们对游戏健康的合理范围，因此我们正在降低它们的有效性。例如，我们通常希望避免创造玩家可以长时间承受不合理的高伤害的情况，因为这极大地扭曲了我们对暗黑破坏神 IV 中战斗方式的看法。
  1. 一些技能和构建没有我们想要的那么有效，所以我们推出了一些增益来增加它们的强度。
  1. Paragon Glyphs 目前提供了过多的玩家力量，因此我们正在降低它们的整体效率。

我们在整个开发过程中一直坚持并将坚持的一个理想是，阶级平衡是一段旅程，而不是目的地。我们希望更多的职业构建在合理范围内变得有趣、强大和具有竞争力。

感谢大家对我们的支持，我们圣域见！

随着包括Unacademy 、 Kuku FM 、 TrulyMadly和 QuackQuack 在内的几家初创公司已向马德拉斯高等法院提出请愿，更多公司可能正计划对谷歌采取法律行动。他们正在对 Google 的通知提出异议，该通知要求使用 Google 的计费系统，否则将被 Play 商店驱逐。报道援引知情人士的话说。这些企业都加入了婚姻。 com 和Shaadi.com挑战谷歌的计费政策并寻求法院的干预。

Matrimony.com 已从高等法院获得针对谷歌的临时禁令，该禁令将一直有效到 6 月 8 日。与此同时，据报道，其他企业也在考虑加入这场官司。一些公司已经启动了法律程序，而其他公司据说正在与他们的法律团队进行讨论。据称，扩大后的挑战者名单包括 Disney+ 和 Hotstar，因为它们也收到了谷歌的警告，并计划通过法庭寻求暂缓执行。

尽管谷歌做出了努力，但马德拉斯高等法院在 6 月 1 日之前阻止了从 Play 商店中删除 Matrimony.com 应用程序，这要归功于暂缓批准。预计谷歌将在 6 月 8 日之前提出其论点，这标志着截止日期的到期。

谷歌已经向几家公司发送了通知邮件，声明：

“您的应用使用非 Google Play 计费系统来接受支付以访问应用内功能或服务，包括任何应用功能、数字内容或商品（统称为“应用内购买”）。您的应用可能会从我们的分发中删除，如果你不解决这个问题，就会在 Google Play 上受到限制，”据报道，ET 看到了其中一封这样的电子邮件。

谷歌将“采取必要措施”

在本月早些时候发布的一篇博文中，谷歌向未实施推荐解决方案之一的印度开发商发出警告，称该公司将被迫对他们“采取必要措施”。

“全球大多数开发商已经选择了这些路线之一。在印度，现在截止日期已经过去，我们正在通知该国尚未实施这些选项之一的开发商，我们将采取必要措施确保我们的政策是公平应用。我们继续遵守当地法律，并在适用的情况下配合当地程序，”谷歌在博客文章中说。

根据印度竞争委员会 ( CCI ) 提出的建议，Google 在今年早些时候推出了用户可选择的计费选项。在此更新中，谷歌宣布选择其他计费方式的用户将在 Google Play 上获得 4% 的订阅费用折扣。因此，在此计费框架内运营的应用程序开发人员需要向 Google 支付 11% 或 26% 的佣金。

Windows 11 Moment 3 为操作系统带来了许多新功能，用户现在可以在他们的计算机上测试每一个功能。我们最近讨论了您是否应该在 Moment 3 之后安装 Windows 11 ，现在，我们将为您提供最新更新中揭示的一些小而有效的细节。

微软最近发布了 Moment 3，这是一项针对 Windows 11 的改进功能，它提供了许多有用的功能和效率改进。由于此更新，许多 Windows 10 用户可能会切换到 Windows 11。微软为其操作系统带来了几个小更新，这里是其中的一些！

改进了应用内语音访问命令的帮助页面

通过每个命令的描述和示例，Windows 11 Moment 3 中的语音访问命令帮助页面现在更加精简和用户友好。该页面还有用于获取更多信息的新类别和用于快速命令访问的搜索框。

扩展了对实时字幕的语言支持

由于 Moment 3 更新，实时字幕功能现在支持更多语言，包括丹麦语、韩语、丹麦语、简体和繁体中文、法语、德语、意大利语、日语、葡萄牙语和其他英语方言。

您可以使用 WIN + Ctrl + L 键盘组合或快速设置辅助功能菜单来激活该选项并享受多种语言的实时字幕。

用于文本选择和编辑的 Fresh Voice Access 命令

新的文本选择和编辑语音访问命令将使用户能够更好地控制他们的内容。 Windows 11 Moment 3 功能有望提升用户体验，帮助用户轻松使用该功能。

  • 另请阅读： Windows 11 开发：2023 年 5 月更改概述

系统托盘时钟上的秒数

这可能是最小但等待已久的 Windows 11 Moment 3 更新。从现在开始，用户可以选择更详细地查看时钟，包括秒数以及小时和分钟。用户将能够显示秒数并获得更精确的时间信息。

多应用信息亭模式

多应用信息亭模式非常适合多个用户使用同一设备的情况管理员可以禁止特定功能并管理允许哪些应用程序在设备上运行。这可以用于不同的场景，旨在为控制设备的管理员提供更多空间。

触摸键盘设置的增强管理

由于控制触摸键盘何时出现的修改设置，用户现在拥有三种不同的选项。用户将从三个选项中选择最适合他们的一个。

内容自适应亮度控制

在笔记本电脑和二合一设备上，此更新使内容自适应亮度控制 (CABC) 可用。此功能通过根据内容调整显示屏亮度，平衡电池寿命和出色的观看体验。

双因素身份验证代码的复制按钮

通过升级，双因素身份验证 (2FA) 代码将在通知提示中添加一个方便的复制按钮。此功能目前仅提供英语版本，但预计在不久的将来会推出其他语言版本。

  • 另请阅读： Cortana 的 Windows 章节将于今年晚些时候结束

设置中增强的搜索效率

Windows 11 Moment 3 增强了设置搜索功能的功能，实现了更快、更有效的搜索。这将帮助用户在想要在“设置”菜单中查找内容时节省时间。

打印屏幕关键功能的修改

截图工具现在默认按打印屏幕键打开；可以在设置中关闭此功能。这样，用户无需进行任何额外的点击，因为该工具将在“打印屏幕”按钮被激活后自动运行。

VPN 状态图标

如果您使用的是 VPN，您会在页面右下角的互联网连接图标上看到一个小图标。这样，用户就会知道他们是否连接到 VPN 服务器。

改进的云和集成搜索建议

最后但同样重要的是，Windows 11 Moment 3 增强了云端推荐和集成搜索建议功能，帮助用户使用输入法编辑器 (IME) 以简体中文输入知名术语。
